text: The ÍBV women's handball team is the women's handball department of Íþróttabandalag Vestmannaeyja. As of the 2017-2018 season, they play in the Úrvalsdeild kvenna. Its head coach is Hrafnhildur Skúladóttir. ==History== ÍBV won their first women's national championship in 2000 and followed up by winning it in 2003, 2004 and 2006. ==Coaches== * Hrafnhildur Skúladóttir 2015-present ==Notable players== * Sandra Erlingsdóttir ==Trophies and achievements== * Icelandic champions (4): ** 2000, 2003, 2004, 2006 * Icelandic Handball Cup (3): ** 2001, 2002, 2004 * Division I (2): ** 1986, 1988 Source ==References== ==External links== * Category:Handball teams in Iceland Category:Women's handball clubs Category:Íþróttabandalag Vestmannaeyja
title: ÍBV women's handball
